description: Standard loan evaluation output for individual agents

approval_type_definitions.STANDARD_TERMS: Applicant approved with standard market rates and terms (typical interest rate, standard repayment period, no special conditions)
approval_type_definitions.SUBOPTIMAL_TERMS: Applicant approved but with higher cost or stricter conditions (higher interest rate, risk-based pricing, collateral/co-signer required, shorter term, or larger down payment)
approval_type_definitions.MANUAL_REVIEW: Borderline case requiring human review or additional information (not enough data to decide automatically, need documentation, requires manual underwriting)
approval_type_definitions.DENIAL: Credit not extended (risk too high, does not meet minimum criteria, not creditworthy)

confidence_guidance.instruction: Use the FULL range of confidence scores (0-100%). Do NOT cluster around 50%.
confidence_guidance.high_confidence: 80-100% when decision is clear and well-supported
